details.label: VoIP Web App
details.content: Developed the enterprise level VoIP Web App for Call Centers, redesigned the realtime data pipeline with multi-datasources, ensure switching between several datasources without data loss, and enhanced the SLA with 0.9%, also led the migration from AngularJS directives to Web Components, increased page loading speed

details.label: Developer Console
details.content: Built an internal developer web app for querying, filtering and monitoring online server data and status, make it easier for on-call engineers to debug and respond

details.label: 小桃酱App
details.content: Redesigned the online shopping hybrid app with Swift and Webkit

details.label: Chatbot
details.content: Designed a Japanese LINE chatbot for predicting used car price by interactively talking to user, getting car specs, and feeding the data to a trained AI model.

details.label: Customized Wi-Fi Firmware
details.content: Designed and built a Wi-Fi probe packet sniffer program based on Broadcom MIPS Linux system. Integrated the iBeacon protocol with an onboard BLE chip.

details.label: Wi-Fi Setup Smart Wizard
details.content: Designed and built an iOS App for Wi-Fi device setup through Bluetooth protocol.

details.label: Data cluster
details.content: Designed and built a data cluster with Hadoop file system for the storage and analysis of 10s of TB Wi-Fi signal packet data.

details.label: Data pipeline
details.content: Designed the data pipe with WebSocket and AMQP. Containerized services and made it scalable on demand with Tutum.

details.label: Coo.ki
details.content: Designed and built a twitter-like information sharing iOS App.

details.label: DirectReader
details.content: Designed and built a dropbox-like iOS App and MacOS App.
Designed and built a game (League of Legend game) assistant iOS App to help game players choose better strategy before the game start by detecting the opponents in the chatting room using XMPP.

title: 国立忠南大学（Chungnam National University）
韩国大田
subtitle: 计算机科学与工程学士学位
2007年 3月 -- 2011年 3月
